name: ResourcesListBonitaV1

text.value:
{{"Add a new resource (page, form, layout, theme, or REST API extension)." | translate }}
{{"This resource will be installed at global scope (not at process or application level)." | translate }}
{{"This archive (.zip file) must contain a page.properties file at the root level, and a folder named 'resources'." | translate }}
{{"This properties file must at least define the name, displayName and contentType(default contentType is 'page')." | translate }}
{{"The 'resources' folder must contain either the index.html or the Index.groovy file and the resources needed." | translate }}

placeholder.value: Click here to choose your .zip file

text.value: {{'Access denied. For more information, check the log file.' | translate}}
{{'Resource successfully installed.' | translate}}
{{'Installing resource.' | translate}}

value: //on first call we need load next page
return user.firstname && user.lastname ? user.firstname + " " + user.lastname : user.userName;
// diplay the first page of resources on page load or when the filter change
// set the next page to be requested to 2 since the first page is in the memory
// saving the other half to be displayed later
// set resources to undefined as the script is triggered when click on load more resources button
// and to prevent this block of code from being executed (prevent resetting the displayedResources)
// add next page of resources to the list of next resources to display
// display the next resources from the memory
// when there are no more resources in the memory
return uiTranslate("A page already exists with the name defined in page zip content");
return uiTranslate('Invalid file format. For more information, check the log file.');
return uiTranslate("An error has occurred. For more information, check the log file.");

description: This page allows to manage UI resources of an application. It is dedicated to Administrator-like profiles. You can export it and edit it in the UI Designer.
